name: The Cape of the Lich King
data: It decreases the users strength pathetically.
It decreases the users dexterity pathetically.
It decreases the users constitution pathetically.
It increases the users wisdom poorly.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It has little armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration noticably.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'unholy ceremony'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'willpower'.
The Cape of the Lich King gives a bonus to some necromantic abilities.
